item.title: UK Theatre Network - UK theatre tickets, reviews, news and interviews
item.description:
UK Theatre Network - UK theatre tickets, reviews, news and interviews

Visit us for 2 for 1 tickets, cheap theatre tickets, discount theatre tickets for West End and Aylesbury, Glasgow, Edinburgh, Manchester, Newcastle, London. Theater tickets for London musicals, theater news and London tickets with reviews and seating plans

item.title: Review of Brendan Cole - A Night To Remember
item.description:
Review of Brendan Cole - A Night To Remember

Strictly Come Dancing has one of those Marmite followings. Love it or hate it, it has attracted TV audiences in their millions and is one of the few programmes to knock X-Factor off it's perch on a Saturday night. I wouldn't class myself as a fan, but I have watched it on occasions for some light entertainment.

item.title: Review of Private Lives at Richmond Theatre
item.description:
Review of Private Lives at Richmond Theatre

I moved to Teddington about 6 years ago and I regard it as home now. It's infamous for a few things, including the recently closed Teddington Studios where most of the TV programmes I grew up with were filmed, and the school opposite is responsible for giving Keira Knightley her interest in drama.
